content.detailedDescription: Just stepped out for lunch.  fast moving and reflecting the sun.  first thought was fighter jet headed to mitchel airport.  object was moving at very fast rate then descended sharply without changing attitude pitch or inverting before dive.  i was sure,  wish i had time to get my binoculars. object moved over horizon.  i was south and east of object with noon sun high overhead which gave this object the reflective look. if we dont report this stuff we will never know.
content.summary: Moving fast descended fast and moved over horizon

content.detailedDescription: It was thundering outside, but no lighting or rain. my father screamed out to me from our deck "come outside now!!!!". he pointed up to the sky where i saw 4 bright randomly flashing lights all in a straight line. my father and i conversed about what these lights could possibly be but could not seem to conclude that it was anything from this world. these lights began to progressively spread out until they took on the shape of a rectangle. they then proceeded to move towards the ocean at a relatively quick pace. i got chills running all down my body and began hearing an uproar of what sounded like a jet engine. the lights moved into a cloud that was just of the coast, and when it did lighting shot of in all direction for duration of about a minute. afterwards the lightning ceased as did the clouds themselves.
content.summary: 4 bright lights move towards ocean, then vanish in cloud of lighting.

content.detailedDescription: While standing on patio listening to baseball game i noticed a very bright triangular light formation in sky. i have noticed other strange things in sky before i watch the sky rather diligently. i am quite familiar w star formations in the sky when i looked up i saw a triangle.   lights were very bright. much brighter than surrounding stars.  spring triangle formation of stars could be seen in background. my triangle overlapped but offset at base of triangle from natural formation. as i stood there and looked my first thought was how bright the lights were and mainly why i never noticed that particular formation before.  i was awestruck. lights stayed in place all night.   at one point i noticed another light light very similar in brightness approach toward base of triangle.  as it got close light disappeared. around 11pm i called it a night. light was still there. next evening i looked at sky.  no bright triangle   just the spring triangle formation   at that point i realized how weird the preview evening was
content.summary: Large triangle formation   much brighter than other stars.  was not the celestial spring triangle. could see that on background

content.detailedDescription:
Was leaving my friends house. there were 4 of us including me. saw ufos before so i like looking up at the stars. 3 of my friends were talking when i noticed something. this looked like a ufo ive seen before so i decided to get my friends attention.

of the 4 1.5 was skeptic. 1 was skeptic the other was skeptic but open to the idea.

to get there attention i pointed and said " thats plane is moving fast."

they looked up because the object was kinda traveling fast.

"yah its a plane... its a plane... its a plane ohhhhh thats not a plane.

the object was traveling horizontally across the skies when it suddenly shot up. like how you shoot a roman candle up in the air.  the object was gone. that was cool never seen it like that before.
content.summary: Its a plane! ohhh thats not a plane!

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to bus stop to go to work. i was going underneath a tree when my awareness was directed upwards. i looked up and saw a star like object directly over head. pretty far up maybe the height regular planes fly when traveling to another state.It was still a bright day outside. there were clouds out but there were no clouds in the region of the ufo. i thought to myself "hmmm this must be what a ufo looks like. but the only way for me to really know is for it to disappear." i was still walking while observing this. as i came from underneath the tree the star was gone.

i had now stopped in my path. i decided to look up for a while, the object reappeared... it was turning invisible to visible like someone was playing with the fade to transparent but on photoshop but in in real life. i observed this for 10 mins. 

at the brightest section of that "fade adjusting" it was bright like a star. it looked like it was reflecting the sunlight. it was silver in color like aluminum.

at the mid of the fade i could actually see the shape and of the craft.

the craft faded away. i started back towards the bus stop. upon reaching the buss stop 10mins or so went by as i wondered and replayed the event in my head. the idea of recording it with my phone also dawned on me too. sadly every time i took it out to record the event the ufo would turn fully invisible. another couple mins would go by and it would come out again and this proceeded a couple times until i gave up trying to record it.Another star like object was on the horizon. i did not realize when it may of popped up or if it had been there the whole time. at this time the sun was starting to set and the color of the sky was of a orange hue. so at this point i believed it to be an actual star. until it started to fade in and out again. 

i noticed that clouds around the object were being sucked up. i observed this for a while more than 10mins this time. until it completely disappeared and didnt re appear. 

the buss was late by the way as expected....

i saw another star like object but this time it was south west heading east. this one could of been a plane but it had the same steady bright silver star like color as the other ones. it was also traveling pretty fast compared to planes in my opinion. it seemed like it was heading my direction.

it disappeared and i realized the buss was just down the street....

the end.

didn't know of mofun till the movie sirius aired. even then ive seen so many ufo i didn't think it was relevant to list the events.
content.summary: Didnt belive in ufo till i seen this.

content.detailedDescription: Contact me
content.summary: Contact me

content.detailedDescription:
Light beams shaped like seams on a football with beams at both ends like spokes of a bike rotating in opposite directions. looked similar to the object on the "fayatteville" show on tv but the central shape was more like a football than an egg, however the protruding "spoke" shaped light beams look much like the one in fayetteville, north carolina on january 8, 2007 incident.
the arced beams in the central portion, the ones that were shaped like seams on a football also seemed to rotate around its football shape and then seemed to cut through the middle like tines on an egg beater. could not see any craft against the dark sky. only saw the intensely bright beams. depth perception and possibly size were skewed because of the dark. object seemed enormous but perspective may be off due to the solid darkness and nothing to reference it to.
content.summary: Light beams shaped like seams on a football with beams at both ends like spokes of a bike rotating in opposite directions

content.detailedDescription: Although this event occurred several years ago, it is still very clear in my mind because it was unusual and i could not explain it. after a quick summer rainstorm early one evening, my brother and i were perched on the hood of his 1971 plymouth duster which was parked on the street and were each drinking a beer. we were facing north up the street when two spheres appeared over the horizon to the north. these spheres roughly followed the road. they passed overhead and we lost sight of them as they fell below the horizon to the south. they were probably in sigh for 60 seconds or so, give or take 20 seconds. what was unusual was the constant speed (not a high speed, but not slow either, maybe 40-50 mph but hard to say without reference points) at which they both moved, in parallel, and in a straight line. it was difficult to tell how high they were, but they were under the disapating cloud cover remaining fron the storm, maybe 1000-1500 feet. they were unaffected by the wind which was blowing at ground level at 10-15 mph. there was no sound, no light, no emissions coming from the spheres. it was difficult to judge their size as they were not near other objects for any reference point and their height was unknown, but a rough estimate is 25-30 feet in diameter. from the ground, the size appeared to be that of baseballs. they did not seem to be reflecting light (nneded to check to submit), as their silver/aluminum color did not vary. i am writing this to you at this time because y'all may have encountered something similar in your research and i would like to know what these spheres might have been. at first we though they may have been weather balloons, but we ruled these out because of the constant speed and straight line motion. i am interested in your thoughts and whether you have any other similar sightings. year of observation could have been 1975-1978, date sometime in mid-late summer. thanks.
content.summary: Twin aluminum colored spheres moving in parallel at constant speed

content.detailedDescription: The bright yellow ball appeared to the north at sunset, then after about half a minute has shifted eastward.
content.summary: Light circle

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work down interstate 71. i noticed a large bright white light 
moving north on the east side of the highway, i knew right away what it was because no airplanes are that big. i stepped on the gas pedal to get down to it faster, i must have been going at least 90 mph. it made a turn to the west across the interstate, i was close at this point i pulled the car to the shoulder and shut it off. it was right there in the field just off the highway. 
i looked out the side view mirror of my 
car and seen traffic about 2 miles back, i got out and ran around the front of the car to the passenger side front fender, the craft was no more than 200 feet maybe 300 feet away from me, it was lower than the treetops the bottom edge of it. 
3 large white lights underneath about 25 to 30 feet across, set at each corner of the triangle.
1 small red light in the center of the bottom about the size i don't know baseball it look small to me. 
i observed for different level of windows on the north side of the ship moving to the west
content.summary: Triangular craft at least six floors high, multiple level of windows, it was only moving 5 or 6 mph

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a small bag of garbage to the garbage unit out in the front yard.  i walked out the front door and glanced up, watching birds.  something shiny caught my attention and i looked up and saw a sphere approaching from the west.  at first i thought the sun was simply reflecting off of it, but it was too bright and as it moved the light didn't waver as it would have were it merely reflecting light.

my first thought was that it reminded me of a satellite in the night sky.  the way it moved, the single, unwavering light, and no sound.  but of course it wasn't a satellite.

our house is surrounded by tall trees.  the object skimmed over the treetops; perhaps about 35 to 40 feet above them.  there was absolutely no noise coming from it.

i looked away as i went down the steps towards the garbage can, then looked back up as i stepped onto the yard.  it was finally dawning on me this was not something you look away from.  it was now going over the house, still shining brightly like a powerful light bulb.  it was moving along at a pretty good clip; maybe about 40 to 45 miles an hour.

lost sight of it for a second as it disappeared behind some treetops, but i trotted to the driveway and it came back into view for another couple of seconds, still heading easterly, before it again disappeared behind treetops.  it would have gone over my neighbor's house next, but only because its path seemed to be following the road rather than heading in a strict eastern direction.  it's path was bending slightly north as it made its way across our property and disappeared from view, as does the road.

the south side of the road ~ which i live on and which the object was flying over ~ is fairly heavily treed as opposed to the north side, which is more open farm field.

it occurred to me after the object disappeared that this was likely just a drone used by law enforcement, but as i pondered the event it seems to me that drones are typically used for spying, which requires stealth.  so why would it be emitting light, and a very bright one at that?  furthermore, i've looked at many pictures of drones and none look like this object.  additionally, the speed was surprising.  it was moving considerably fast and again, i'm not sure high-speed capabilities are characteristic of law-enforcement drones (or drones in general).
content.summary: Observed a bright sphere approaching overhead from west.  went over house headed easterly; seemed to be traveling the curve of the road, but remained on southern side of road which was treed.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch looking at the lake. on the horizon in the northeast i saw an object in the sky that i thought was an aircraft. upon further observation i saw it had no blinking green or blue lights like a commercial aircraft is required to have. then i thought it could have been military, so i grabbed binoculars and observed 3 bright lights stationary side by side in a horizontal pattern. then i noticed on the bottom a blinking red light. i tried to count the interval between blinks but it was all random. i also noticed the 3 white lights would almost change shape, but it seemed to be sending patterns of light from one end to the other. it was moving slowly away from me and began to dissapear into the horizon. i lost focus of the craft after about 30 minutes of observing it. i was really excited i saw this because i know for fact it wasnt commercial, and if it was military, i dont know an aircraft currently with 3 boosters on it. so i assumed i saw an expiermental aircraft. oddly enough 10-20 miles southeast of my home is the avon park airforce base. so this led to my assumption of military aircraft, but im not 100%. definetly odd, and appeared to be like the well talked about ufos of the past. fit descriptions perfectly.
content.summary: 3 bright white lights, blinking red light in center

content.detailedDescription: Lumiere tres tres rouge
content.summary: Lumiere tres tres rouge

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Myself and a freind were standing on my back deck one night conversing, talking about various subjects and observing the night sky when all of a sudden a orange orb just appeared out of the sky at a distance from us, moved closer to us and began to descend closer to the tree tops, hovered in position for 20 seconds, changed direction several times and hoved in place again, then changing direction with it's position and altitude and then disappeared. my freind and i both continued our conversation and then after 2 minutes the orb reappeared, this time from a different position in the night sky from where it had originally appeared and began to perform a series of airial movements. at this point my freind and began to speak abpout what we were actually seeing, as this orange reddish colored orb made absolutely no audible sound that we could detect. we both simized that it was not an airplane based on the actual movements of the object, so i thought it could have been a helicopter. my freind went into the house and grabbed her high powered field binocculars and we started examining this object. i could not see any other structure pertaining to this object except the orange orb, which seemed to be spinning around the circumference of the orb its'elf. we both watched as this orb made abrupt stops, turns, accelrations, decensions and ascentions in the sky. i could not beleive this might possibly be an actual ufo, because at that time i really did not believe in them. as the object was overhead i took the binocculars and tried to trace from the orb to the ground to see if this was some kind of possible projection from another location. my friend and i did not see anything like that, after watching this object perform these manuevors for approximately 3 to 5 minutes, it ascended into the air extremely rapidly and disappeared again, not fading away, it just vanished. so sure enough after about 1 to 2 minutes it appeared again, so this time i went in the house and grabbed my wife and all 3 of us stood hear watching this object play around in the sky for about another 5 to 7 minutes, before disappearing for the last time. in all i guess we observed this object for a total length of about 13 to 20 minutes visable in the sky. this then prompted me to inquire if others had seen this object and i saw 1 other person had seen this object and sent in inquiry into a local hagerstown newspaper. this also prompted me to start my own research and i have discovered that i am not crazy or seeing things as others have seen and even filmed these orange orbs,as well as many other types of crafts. i have been in the military and have seen and flown in different types of man made aircraft before, but i had never seen anything move in the manner that this object was able to move in terms of it's ability to manuveur, it's speed and it did not make a sound. and we were speaking in a normal somewhat quiet voice tone, at it's lowest descention point to us i would estimate that it would have been maybe 110 to 200 feet above us and roughly a quarter of a mile from us in distance. it was not to far from actually being over my back yard.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: On back porch with my wife and friend when object appeared in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was going into old pictures and came across 2 pics in the everglades. at the time i did not notice the orb. i was looking at the picture to delete it and i see the orb. i thought it was just some flare but i saw another one. i'm sorry i cant remember everything from that day but i do remember parts of that day. i still have the pics.. no they are not altered at all......
content.summary: I found a picture of me with it in the backround

content.detailedDescription: Appeared from behind a tree line to the sw.  we ovserved a single redish light for 3-5 minutes flying in a straint line towards the ne, passing directly over our heads at around 920 pm on june 9, 2013.  there was no sound and was lower than most planes that land at our regional airport.  light finally just dissapeared while we were watching it.  it wasn't a plane due to the one light and silence, not a flare which would have changed brightness.  was moving quicker than the small planes do.  a few seconds after it disapeared a jet came into view (much, much higher) with the flashing lights and sound coming from it.  anyone have any thoughts, ideas as to what it could be?
content.summary: Straight flight, single redish light flew directly over us.

content.detailedDescription:
This morning at 7:23 am i seen a silver/gray object (cigar shape) traveling along, it stopped in mid air paused for about 5 secs and dropped straight down slowly into a cloud and stayed there, i never seen it after it went into the small cloud. it had no wings, i watched it for about 30 secs.
either sun glint or a light brightened up on it as it stopped and went straight downward. 
i was on new tullahoma hwy heading into tullahoma from the hwy the object would have been on the left over by the rose hill memorial gardens (cemetery)
approx: 45 degree angle in the sky above horizon
content.summary: Tullahoma tn - silver cigar shaped object no wings traveling along, stopped and went straight down

content.detailedDescription: I have some pictures that need to show you. i really need to talk to you..
content.summary: N/a

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was inside the lounge room playing ps3 when my friend my house mate and his girlfriend come running through from the back yard saying there's a ufo there's a ufo so i leaped up running to the front yard and shore enough there was a huge orb of light hovering over bendigo victoria in australia i didn't think to grab a camera because i was shocked that this was happening. but thankfully thousands of people seen and filmed it. it started moving and changing direction like nothing i have ever seen before pulsating with a yellowy whitish colour.It kept moving around for about half an hour before it just vanished like turning off a light about 3 years before this event there was another sighting that i did not see but got front page on the local news paper didn't think anything of it till i seen it for myself.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating light hovering and changing direction no sound and just disapeared in to thin air

content.detailedDescription:
Location: valleyview neighborhood, edmonton, ab, canada
date: may 3, 2013
time: 9:50 pm local, dusk 
weather: mostly clear, scattered alto cumulus.  according to the weather network: ceiling 8,400 ft., ground wind 10km/h from sw, 10 celcius
camera:  nikon d7000 dslr, nikon 70-300mm vr lens set at 300mm, manually focused, video at highest quality setting.

i was in my back-alley driveway picking up raspberry sticks i had pruned earlier that evening, when i noticed four or five very bright, flickering, reddish-orange lights moving just above, behind and beside the tops of nearby spruce trees, at about 45 degrees elevation, south-south-east.

"fire balloons (aka. chinese lanterns)," i thought for a second.  "cool."
  
they were close together; the group at first sight covering a spread of about 5 degrees.  however, as i watched, i saw they were quickly fanning out, each moving on individual horizontal or downward vectors.  my impression was that i had just missed seeing the objects being launched or emerging from a single spot.  the trees started to block my view, vexingly preventing an exact count, but four were in sight at the same time for sure.  there may have been a fifth object.
 
i suddenly realized they were not balloon lanterns!  first, the colour was wrong (reddish orange, not the usual whitish yellow). second, they were all very bright (initially), at least a bright as airliner landing lights.  third, they were quickly spreading out, not trailing along together.  fourth, they flickered too wildly.  fifth, and most tellingly, at least three of these objects were travelling into the wind at a fairly rapid rate. i should add here that, in the quiet of late evening, i heard no sound from these objects and saw no blinking navigation lights.

so, after a few seconds of observation, i realized i had orange orb ufos in sight (for the third time in the last 2 years: once in amsterdam--april, 2011; twice in edmonton--dec., 2012 and this day.)  i ran for my photography equipment, nowadays almost always at hand for just such an unusual occasion.  i have seen other anomalous flying objects, but visually recorded only one once before.  my nikon d7000 dslr with 70-300mm vr lens was on a small table in the open garage and the tripod was on the backyard deck.  in about twenty seconds i had the camera and tripod setup in a spot with the best visibility (on the deck, which is elevated).  by this time, only two objects were were still in sight, now due south, my view of the other two or three presumably blocked by the trees.  actually, a third, dimmer object was also in view, but i didn't see it at all until i watched the video later.
  
i recorded three video clips, one each from my deck, driveway, and back-alley, moving to keep the subject in view.   my personal feelings while recording were those of urgency and technical concern (to get the ufos on video) mixed with contained excitement and a certain amount of eerie awe at viewing alien technology in person.  i felt no unusual physical or psychological sensations nor were there any noticeable electromagnetic anomalies.  my attention was split between viewing the objects as closely as possible and the process of operating the camera.  caught up in this dual preoccupation, and with every second precious, i completely forgot about the binoculars i also keep handy.  i also neglected to take some still frames.  video was all i had in mind at the time.  
 
to my naked eye, the objects looked like single, orange, disk-like blobs with a reddish, wildly irregular, upward flickering.   they looked very similar to an object/light i had videoed this past winter.  in that case, the object was further away, and i had only a short focal length lens on the camera, hand-held at night.  this time, i had closer objects, a tripod, a tele-zoom lens on my dslr and the sky was not completely dark.  as interesting as watching the lights was, it wasn't until i viewed the video clips on a monitor that i saw any shape or detail.
 
in clip one, taken from the deck, there are three objects, two objects are brightly lit, the third very dimly lit.   all the objects are defying the wind, which is from the south-west.  the lowest object rapidly drops from view, dimming as it does so, descending and or heading south-south-west away from me.  in that direction is our city's river valley, a small zoo, some large parks, and forested trails. the remaining bright object moves west, from left to right nearly horizontally.   it appears to subtly adjust course as it moves.  a third, dim, unseen-by-my-eye object enters the top left of the frame just before i stop recording, following the object going west.  i didn't notice this third object until i had viewed the clip many times, so fixated was my attention on the brighter object.
 
the second clip is taken from the driveway. the object looks bigger, closer in the second clip, so, from when i first saw it, it seems to have changed course somewhat more to the north, toward me.  also, it seems to have brightened or more completely illuminated itself compared to the first clip.  while recording the second clip, i checked the focus briefly as it looked fuzzy/blob-ish on the camera's small live-view screen.   oh, and the objects (and the scene in general) appear darker to a degree in the video than it was in reality, owing to the equipment's limitations in low-light.   to my eye, the object was a very bright, flickering light, whereas the video revealed it was in fact a glowing, seemingly irregular cylinder with the brightest light emitting from the base.
 
in clip three, the object appears to move in a slightly winding, serpentine motion, noticiable if you zip the clip back and forth quickly.  while recording clip three in the back alley, a passing dog-walker distracts me and i loose sight of the object as it goes behind a pole. i wait for it to reappear, but, to my unaided eye, it has disappeared in the gloom. so i stop recording after a moment or two in order to move the camera yet again.  however, i don't see or record anything further.  i didn't mention to the dog-lady that i had a ufo sighting in progress because the ufo was fading and going behind the pole.

upon reviewing clip three on a monitor, i was surprised to see that the object did indeed reappear from behind the pole,  but it had dropped its illumination so substantially i couldn't see it in the deeply twilit sky.   had i seen it, i would have been able to capture another 10 seconds or so of "flight".

i am pleased and impressed by what i saw and the footage i captured.  i have familiarised myself, through study and direct observation, with the usual things commonly mistaken for ufos.  i can attribute nothing natural or human-made to my sighting on may 3, 2013.
content.summary: I captured 3 hd video clips of orange orb ufos over edmonton.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard laying on my back in a screen-sided tent texting on my phone. i noticed the object when i looked away from my phone and saw it silently making its way southeast overhead. i wasn't sure what i was seeing when i first saw it because i knew right away it was unlike any aircraft i have ever seen. it was rectangular in shape and a silver-ish gray in color. it had red, green, and white lights strobing around the entire craft in a counter clockwise pattern. at first i thought it was flying south but as i watched it i noticed it was heading in a more southeast direction. it was going at what seemed to be a constant and relaxed speed, a bit slower than planes usually fly but not by much. a few times it looked as if it turned slightly transparent or invisible but the lights stayed the same, it was under cloud cover so i don't think clouds were the culprit. it was completely silent and any plane or jet flying that low would have made noise. i felt calm and intrigued as i watched it. it certainly didn't seem like anything to be afraid of. i was going to get a video of it but the camera on my phone is horrible and wouldn't have picked it up. i sat and watched it disappear as it flew out of sight. i sat there for a moment and questioned what i saw and came to the conclusion that it was something rather unusual. i lost sight of it because where i live there are a lot of trees and houses and i couldn't see past them.
content.summary: Rectangle shaped object flew silently overhead

content.detailedDescription: Went outside saw a bright pretty red pulsating light ,i ran in to get my sister n it was still there ,appearing to come closer no sound still then it looked like it was slowly going away then a sudden blink out.When i took my photo on my phone it showed up white. wierd
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Fast moving glowing brigh red then slowed no noise then gone

content.detailedDescription: In a parking lot eating fast foodh. i tok a series of around 5 pictues of moon during sunset.  while looking at pictures latter. i noticed pair of small white dots, orbs?, in first picture above moon at left.  then i saw these same pair of white objects in three more pictures in surrounding arears  near moon. i don't believe they are lense flare.  guy
content.summary: Taking pictures of moon at sunset. inspection revealed pair of white orb like objects above moon on most pictures i took.

content.detailedDescription:
1)on the roof looking at the sky.
2)it just appeared where we were looking.
3)i thought it was a ufo which it was.
4)1st object was a triangular(pizza)shape and was green/white with small circles on the bottom of the ship and the 2nd was a thin rectangular shape that was glowing orange.
5)me and my cousin were both in shock and a little frightened especially after the 2nd sighting.
6)it disappeared into the horizon.
content.summary: First was pizza shaped and the 2nd was a rectangular shape!! very thin

content.detailedDescription:
I am writing this for a friend, as he is leary.
1.In logan square neighborhood in chicago during a very busy time of day. 
2.It was broad daylight, blue skies, the ufo was extremely close for it being in a city.
3.A ufo. unmistakable.
4.Slow moving saucer rotating,
5.Utter shock and awe, looking around to see if anyone else saw.. at the time no one else did. not sure.
6. it took off in a blink/
content.summary: Daytime viewing of saucer shaped craft in populated area during rush hour.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
It was about 10:50pm est. my wife and i were walking outside to her car, as she had to go to work and i was seeing her off.  i looked to the west and saw a yellow-orange light in the west, heading east, coming towards us .  at first i thought it was an aircraft, possibly a helicopter, as there is a trauma flight helo pad a couple blocks away and it was moving at a slow rate of speed.  but there was no noise. i then pointed it out to my wife.  then we both thought it might be meteor, as is did seem to be flaming and shedding very small sparks.  the sparks were few and very small, coming both from the rear of the object, as well as the sides toward the rear. 
but the sky is overcast (rained all day) and the object was below the cloud cover.  

the object wasnt perfectly round, nor oval, nor did it have a long tail. it did seem to have almost a bullet with wings shape, as it passed more sidelong to us, like the flame was forming some kind of small wings.  they werent wings, but the flame, the closer it got, spread out in a short winged shape

the object seemed to curve to the ne. 
 
 it appeared to be a deep orange as it went out of sight to the northeast.


i did run to grab my camera and have it on video, though not sure of the quality.
content.summary: Thought we saw a meteor or helo, but was below cloud cover and no tail or noise

content.detailedDescription: In back yard around 1am when i was struggling with being home from a lung collapse earlier that day, and was as stupid as sounds looking up trying to calm myself down , when i was looking at the starts above my house the brightest thing i have ever seen crossed the star i was looking at, it was around 8 x the size of the stars that was out and easy 20x brighter, it crossed the star i was looking at, stopped, hoovered for a few seconds then changed direcion and went towards my west, it then moved back to wards were it had come from ( direction) , then i ran into house for my phone ( i would nt have run for anything else as just recovering for a lung collapse ) when i tryed to take a pic my mobile was not good enough to do so , but i got to watch it head west again till it just was to far away to see, i would say was around 10mins i got to watch this for and felt totally blessed
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Brightest thing i ever seen , caught my eye as crossed star i was looking at

content.detailedDescription: I take pictures of the weather & clouds all the time. on the 6th, i was out walking my dog and taking pictures. it was probably around 2 or 3 in the afternoon.  my camera is a digital nikon.  when i uploaded the photos, i noticed a small cylindrical object behind an airplane. at the time i took the picture, i hadn't noticed either one. i take my pictures so that they upload very large & i reduce their size by 80 to 85%. when i went to reduce this picture, i noticed the object.  there was a golf tournament in nearby memphis and i observed a blimp in the sky the day after this happened, but it looked very obviously like a blimp. this object in my picture does not have the 'under carriage' you see on a blimp and the size seems wrong.  i played around with the picture & made it even larger and inverted the colors and the object is obviously there. pictures taken in the same area of the sky within a few minutes of the same time this picture was taken do not show anything there, airplane or otherwise.  i reduced the size of the picture to about what it was when i uploaded it and reversed the color inversion so that is back to normal.  it is not a bird, or another airplane; i do not know what this is, which by my understanding makes it a ufo.
content.summary: I was out taking pictures & after uploading, noticed an object behind an airplane in the picture.

content.detailedDescription:
witness to formation of 4 craft with black bands descending over aquatore park and passing northeast of blaine water tower

i left work in anoka at 14:00 and was travelling east on highway 10 when i saw aprox. 4 craft in formation moving north and directly parallel to the southbound lane of highway 65. i first noticed the formation as it descended over the eastbound lane of highway 10 aprox. 600 yards from the front of my vehicle. initially, the polk st. bridge (north to south) obstructed my vision but the craft were still visible as i approached. if you are familiar with the area, they would have passed over the food and fuel on 85th ave. and highway 65 southbound just before descending in front of me and possibly 8 other vehicles heading eastbound. there were 2 vehicles astride two more vehicles at the same level, but the 2 farthest from me lagged behind about 10 feet or half of a vehicle. so, the 2 nearest to me were about half of a vehicle forward of the other 2 vehicles. they had an oval configuration with a slight dome and black bands around the center of the vessels. they were around 75 feet high at the point of descent and dropping down to treetop level over aquatore park when i lost sight of them behind the blaine water tower. as i arrived at highway 65 i looked over the park but they were gone. all in all, i saw them for around 20 seconds from start to finish.
content.summary: Witness to formation of 4 craft with black bands descending over aquatore park and passing east of blaine water tower
